title: Expert Learning Experience Design in Complex Adaptive Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in administrative/management tasks and basic comprehension of organizational structures
context.additional_context: Small-group workshop format using smartphone-based VR simulations, emphasizing practical learning experiences in complex organizational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain nonlinear workflows in complex organizational systems through case analyses of three or more scenarios
Learners can identify adaptive organizational network elements (agency, emergence, social networks) via VR simulations and develop learning strategies
Learners can propose work-integrated learning models applicable to real organizational settings through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
